column1: 資料來源： 勞動部「國際勞動統計」。
column27: 附　　註： (7)以4月為當年之開始。
column40: Remark：  (7)Year beginning in April of year indicated.

column27: (8)2006 年後為相當於千人全時就業者職業災害死亡千人率，計算方式(職災死亡人數/全體就業者總工作時數)
column40: (8)The rate represents the number of fatal occupational injuries for 1,000 full-time equivalent workers and was calculated

column1: 附　　註： (1)係職業傷害部分。

column27: ×2,000,000，其中全時勞工依每週工作40 小時，每年工作50 週推計年工時2,000 小時；2005年以前計算方式
column40: as (the number of fatal work injuries/ total hours worked by all employees during the calendar year)*2,000,000,

column27: (職災死亡人數/全體就業者人數)。
column40: where 2,000,000 is the base for 1,000 equivalent full-time workers (working 40 hours per week, 50 weeks per year).
Prior to 2006, the rate was calculated as (the number of fatal work injuries/ total employees)*1,000.

column1: (4)2000年以後資料配合 ILO資料系統同步修正。
column12: (4)Data series from 2000 adjusted follow by the ILO.

column1: (5)不含公共燃氣及電力服務、食品貿易、鐵路及海上運輸及通訊。
column12: (5)Excl. agents of public gas and electricity services, food trade, transport by rail and by sea and communications.

column1: (6)每千人全時受僱者平均災害率。
